message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I get $6000, you get $4000.
Let's be fair and split the money evenly.  This way we both get a good deal.
I understand you want an even split, but time is money!  I'll come down a little, let's settle this.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I need to get at least 5500 to make it worth my while with the inflation.
I'm taking a risk here, Bob.  This is a generous offer considering the inflation working against you.  Let's close this deal now.
Alice, we're running out of time. I'm willing to take a loss to avoid getting nothing at all. Let's go back to your initial offer, but I'll take 4000 instead.
